Planning a virtual celebration or an intimate soiree at home ? Qmin brings to you the quintessential Taj Dining experience with the best of our signature dishes from our iconic restaurants. Experience hospitality reimagined, with a promise of safety, seamless delivery and the highest standards of service, as you savour the taste of our authentic culinary delights.\n\nChoose your personalised menus from multi cuisine options, delivered straight to your door step. Sit back relax and enjoy unforgettable moments while we take care of the rest. virtual meetings corporate management meets social gatherings, birthdays,\nanniversaries & milestones surpises for your family & friends yyyy/MM/dd dd MMM, yyyy qmin_celebrations private_party
